document.full_text: chicago white sox slugger adam dunn was expected to be sidelined for his team's next five games after undergoing an emergency appendectomy, the major league baseball club said on wednesday.
document.title: white sox dunn to miss five games after appendectomy
lines_and_colors: chicago white sox slugger adam dunn was expected to be sidelined for his team's next five games after undergoing an emergency appendectomy, the major league baseball club said on wednesday.
